hero.description: Technical Implementation Unit of Information and Communication Technology that supports the management of information systems, network infrastructure, and technology services within the University of Muhammadiyah Bengkulu.

about.subtitle: Get to Know Us Better
about.description: UPTTIK is a work unit that provides services and management in the fields of information technology, communication, and telecommunications in an institution, such as a school, campus, or government institution.

layanan.title: Our Featured Services
layanan.description: Providing reliable and innovative technology solutions to advance the digital system in the campus environment.

items.title: Infrastructure & Networking
items.subtitle: Strong Network, Maximum Results
items.description: Management and development of campus network infrastructure to ensure stable, fast, and secure connectivity throughout the University of Muhammadiyah Bengkulu.

items.title: Device Service & Maintenance
items.subtitle: Professional and Trusted Service
items.description: Handling of hardware and software is done carefully and professionally to maintain optimal performance of the academic community's work devices.

items.title: Technical Support & IT Support
items.subtitle: Ready to Face Technology Challenges
items.description: The UPTTIK UMB team is always ready to provide technical support, troubleshooting, and solutions for various information technology constraints quickly and accurately.

items.title: Server Configuration & Data Center
items.subtitle: Server and Network Device Management
items.description: Installation, configuration, and monitoring of servers and network devices in data centers/racks to ensure the security and stability of campus information systems.

items.title: Website Development & Information Systems
items.subtitle: Digital Solutions for Institutions and Work Units
items.description: Development of official websites, academic information systems, and web-based applications according to the needs of faculties, study programs, and work units within UMB.

testimonials.title: What
testimonials.description: Your trust and satisfaction are our top priority. Here are the experiences of those who have used our services.

list.name: Habib
list.testimonial: The network infrastructure provided by UPT TIK is very stable and reliable. We are no longer worried about connection disruptions during important activities. Our data security is also guaranteed!

list.name: Rifqi Ardian
list.testimonial: UPT TIK is always responsive to our needs, especially in adapting new technologies. The technical support team is very fast and competent in solving problems. Best service!

list.name: Salman Abdul Aziz
list.testimonial: UPT TIK's Big Data Analysis service has helped us get accurate insights for campus strategic decision making. Academic information system performance is now much more efficient.

list.name: Ariel
list.testimonial: UPT TIK's commitment to technological reliability and innovation is truly proven. The systems they build strongly support digital transformation in our campus environment.

list.name: Rafy
list.testimonial: UPT TIK's commitment to technological reliability and innovation is truly proven. The systems they build strongly support digital transformation in our campus environment.

footer.help_description: UPTTIK IT support team is active and ready to help with your technical problems in real-time.
footer.description: Building the digital future of University of Muhammadiyah Bengkulu through reliable and innovative information technology.

hero.description: Information technology center of excellence dedicated to supporting digital transformation within the University of Muhammadiyah Bengkulu.

about.title: About Us
about.p1: The Technical Implementation Unit of Information and Communication Technology (UPTTIK) is a strategic work unit at the University of Muhammadiyah Bengkulu which is fully responsible for the campus digital governance.
about.p2: We are committed to providing reliable digital infrastructure and integrated information systems to realize excellent service for the entire academic community, in line with the university's vision in developing IPTEKS.

vision.subtitle: Identity & Purpose
vision.title: Defining the Campus Digital Future Through a Directed Vision.
vision.label: Our Vision
vision.content: To be a professional and innovative information technology service unit in the development of IPTEKS, entrepreneurship-oriented, and upholding Islamic values in every service and contribution.

items.title: Professional & Reliable Service
items.description: Providing reliable, fast, and professional information technology services to support university academic and administrative activities.

items.title: Supporting Institutional Independence
items.description: Through the optimal use of information technology to support institutional independence.

items.title: Integrity & Islamic Values
items.description: Instilling Islamic values in information technology management, by upholding integrity, trustworthiness, and social responsibility.

org.title: Organizational Structure
org.description: A dedicated professional team providing the best information technology services
